channel.title: Updates on Container Registry
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on Container Registry

item.title: Harbor Release 2.2.0
item.description: Harbor 2.2.0 was just released and comes with some very interesting features. This post walks you through the newly added features and changes explaining the capabilities. Since the last release of v2.1.0 in September 2020, eleven contributors made 41 changes and resolved 189 issues.
